amendment.description: An amendment numbered 110 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding for Department of the Interior's Office of Diversity, Inclusion and Civil Rights.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 213 (Roll no. 588).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Norman amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 213 (Roll no. 588).
